name: ABH
description:
Overview: This is a psychological thriller game set in the 1990's, you wake up in a strange house and must search the house for a way out, if that is how your story will end.

Environment

The game starts with a very short tutorial of the key mechanics, you will then approach the main house before being transported inside under mysterious circumstances. You will travel throughout the house, finding new rooms and events in order to find your way out. There will be some notes and special items along the way that will aid you in your escape, or not.
